Private Events
Tampa
601 S Harbour Island Blvd. #107
Tampa, FL 33602
813-285-7757
Go big, or keep it intimate. Grab a fire pit or shine bright with the best views of
Tampa
in our private outdoor bar. Hit up the much coveted and chic Liberty Lounge, a must for those memorable events. Or turn up the energy dial with a full venue buyout – hosting over 800 guests.
Elevated American
comfort food
, handcrafted drinks and a high energy
team
that bring their A-Game every time. Whatever your needs, kick back and relax – we’ve got you covered.
Contact us
today and make your private event top-tier with
American Social
in
Tampa, FL
.

Testimonials
Orlando
“Best brunch!! If you're looking for bottomless mimosa, delicious food and great music this is the place to be! (They have a DJ)
Food 5/5- the food was delicious! I had the brunch burger and it was honestly the best burger I've had in a while.
Ambiance 5/5- the music is amazing. It was a mix of r&b throwbacks a little hip hop and some pop. The place is also very cute!
Service 5/5- our server was great! We did the bottomless mimosas and let's just say our glass was never empty.
They have parking available right in front of the restaurant.
Overall I would recommend this place for a girl's brunch or with a group.”
Shanique R. – ★★★★★
Las Olas
I love brunch mostly for the bottomless mimosas because every place has the same brunch food items. Until we tried American Social! The brunch in the keys is a shrimp cake topped with green goddess sauce and the combination of that and the hollandaise sauce is so fresh and delicious! It was so good I still think about this meal. We also tried the fried chicken sandwich (brunch BLAT) and what made it taste a step above anything else was the jalapeño bacon and honey aioli. American Social always has a great vibe with the music and atmosphere. We even got to sit outside and people watch as we ate and drank!
Jordan H. – ★★★★★
Tampa
“I had a fantastic meal here, ribs for Lune, wagyu melt for me, and the drink was so good. I didn't post more Pictures because well Lune and I are out here living our best lives and sometimes it's hard to stop and whip out your phone. Staff at the outside bar was amazing and fun, had a great convo about all kinds of stuff and Lune was a hit people were going out of their way to pet him and that sparked conversations too. Had a great meal and will be back soon.”
Scott K. – ★★★★★
Las Olas
Great happy hour, friendly staff, and beautiful location next to the Miami River in Brickell!!!
Happy Hour is from 4-7pm Monday through Friday and they also have daily specials that are separate from the happy hour as well if you miss it.
Sitting outside is a must to get the views of the beautiful Miami river and scenery.
The staff were very friendly and outgoing from the time of arrival (hostess) to our bartender/server!
Monday nights (after 7pm) they have $7 burgers and fries and discounted Bourbon/Whiskey (;
P.S- They only have valet parking here so make sure to park in the meters or a parking garage near by!
Emely R. – ★★★★★
Give us a review

Private Events
AMSO Event Venues & Spaces
Our venues are sought after for a reason.
From private rooms to
semi-private areas all designed to create lasting memories. Elevated and stylish, but approachable and comfortable, we’ve designed our spaces with the perfect feel for meetings, dinners and parties of all types.
All private rooms have their own bar, so bring the cheer, unwind, shoot the breeze or dress to impress. We set the stage to create knockout events for our guests.

Party at AMSO
Life’s a party. Start celebrating.
At
AmSo
, events aren’t just events—they’re transformative experiences. Picture this: delectable cuisine, captivating music, and an atmosphere crackling with energy, all centered around you. While any restaurant can throw a party, at
American Social
, we curate THE PARTY, where memories are etched into the soul.
Our spirited team is dedicated to providing you and your guests with the VIP treatment you deserve. Embrace life’s moments with us as we celebrate you and keep the good times rolling. Learn more about our
Bottle Service
.
Mobile Image, needs to be seperate as it has to be outside of container and col
Drop In, Be Social Come Alive
AMSO FEELS RIGHT
‘Social’ isn’t just part of our name, it’s who we are and
what we’re all about
.
Specialty drinks, food designed to fit your desires and
tailor-made spaces where electric vibes and social buzz all naturally come together to create truly memorable events
. You’re always our VIP and the reason we love to celebrate. The stage is set, so let’s get to it.
Contact us
with any questions you may have. We are here to help!

Why work with us?
Join the FAMSO
FAMSO isn’t
just some cute
name leadership came up with.
Our servers and bartenders
did because it’s true. We’re a family. If you’d like to work in a social environment where everyone brings their best selves forward to create amazing vibes, you can stop looking.
AmSo
is the place.

A Taste Of AMSO
Food at Amso
Award Winning Food
Our talented chefs do Modern American with a twist, boundary pushing flavors and seasonal features. Upmarket crowd pleasers, food curated for sharing, indulging and having fun – here to fuel the good times.

Raise your glass
Made to fit the unique AmSo
vibes, our picture perfect
drinks
are legendary.
Local craft beers. A wine list that takes you off the beaten path and makes you blush.
Cocktails curated
for every occasion and designed to raise the bar.
Pair it with food, festivities or the game. We’ve always got you covered.

Our Story
Here to play
Created by two long-time friends,
American Social
is a place where traditions are born and legends live on. We offer an exciting atmosphere and unmatched level of service, making
AmSo
the perfect spot for meeting up, hosting a party or
catching a game
. See and be seen while enjoying bold flavors, sipping on specialty cocktails or raising a glass to great friends and good times.
